_a-0000e2cd-bc96-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel
_a-0000e2cd-bc96-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
cast(
  'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Text',
  with(
    local!bundleKeyParse: rule!AS_CO_I18N_UT_parseBundleKey(bundleKey: ri!bundleKey),
    local!label: if(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(local!bundleKeyParse.bundleName),
      ri!i18nData[local!bundleKeyParse.labelKey],
      ri!i18nData[local!bundleKeyParse.bundleName][local!bundleKeyParse.labelKey]
    ),
    local!updatedLabel: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
      nullableValue: local!label,
      replacementValue: ri!bundleKey
    ),
    local!updatedLabelForArguments: if(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!arguments),
      local!updatedLabel,
      reduce(
        rule!AS_CO_I18N_UT_replaceArgument(input: _, index: _, arguments: ri!arguments),
        local!updatedLabel,
        enumerate(count(ri!arguments)) + 1
      )
    ),
    local!updatedLabelForArguments
  )
)

_a-0000e67d-efac-8000-9bcd-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!bundle: a!refreshVariable(
    value: rule!AS_GCM_CO_UT_loadBundleFromFolder(langISOCode: null()),
    refreshAlways: true
  ),
  local!questionnaire: rule!AS_GCM_QNM_QR_getQuestionnaire(
    returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_SINGLE_OBJECT,
    setId: ri!clauseSetId,
    triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh
  ),
  local!clauseSet: rule!AS_GCM_QE_getClauseSetDetails(
    setId: ri!clauseSetId,
    returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_SINGLE_OBJECT
  ),
  if(
    rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(local!questionnaire),
    rule!AS_GCM_noQuestionnaireInAnswerQuestionnaireSection(
      bundle: local!bundle,
      readOnly: true,
      isAmendmentOrModification: or(
        local!clauseSet.refCategory.refDataId = cons!AS_GCM_REF_ID_CATEGORY_AMENDMENT,
        local!clauseSet.refCategory.refDataId = cons!AS_GCM_REF_ID_CATEGORY_MODIFICATION
      ),
      isExistingVehicle: local!clauseSet.isExistingVehicle
    ),
    a!localVariables(
      local!calculatedQuestionMetadata: rule!AS_GCM_QNM_UT_calculateQuestionMetadata(
        allQuestions: local!questionnaire.questions
      ),
      rule!AS_GCM_QNM_CPS_displayQuestionsSection(
        readOnly: true,
        bundle: local!bundle,
        calculatedQuestionMetadata: local!calculatedQuestionMetadata,
        questionnaire: local!questionnaire
      )
    )
  )
)

_a-0000e825-ca6c-8000-9bf8-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
rule!AS_CO_UT_queryEntity(
  entity: cons!AS_GCM_ENT_CLAUSESET_CONTRACT_TYPE,
  entityType: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GCM}AS_GCM_ClauseSet_ContractType_Map',
  returnType: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!returnType,
    default: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_OBJECT_ARRAY
  ),
  executeWhen: and(
    ri!executeWhen,
    or(
      any(
        rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(_),
        {
          ri!additionalFilters,
          ri!logicalExpression,
          ri!aggregation
        }
      ),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!setId)
    )
  ),
  /* To ensure proper null checks, we'll force all queryFilter values to not be null */
  logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
  filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "setId",
      operator: "=",
      value: ri!setId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "isActive",
      operator: "=",
      value: a!defaultValue(value: ri!isActive, default: true()),
      applywhen: ri!showInactive <> true()
    ),
    ri!additionalFilters
  },
  sort: ri!sort,
  aggregation: ri!aggregation
)

_a-0000ec50-376f-8000-9d94-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_getColorBasedOnColorName
_a-0000ec50-376f-8000-9d94-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!match(
  value: ri!colorName,
  /* White Colors */
  equals: "WHITE",
  then: cons!AS_GCM_HEX_CODE_WHITE,
  equals: "WHITE_2",
  then: cons!AS_GCM_HEX_CODE_WHITE_2,
  /* Gray Colors */
  equals: "GRAY_0",
  then: cons!AS_GCM_HEX_CODE_GRAY_0,
  equals: "GRAY_1",
  then: "#EDEDF2",
  equals: "GRAY_2",
  then: "#DCDCE5",
  equals: "GRAY_3",
  then: cons!AS_GCM_HEX_CODE_GRAY_3,
  equals: "GRAY_4",
  then: "#2E2E35",
  /* Orange Colors */
  equals: "ORANGE_1",
  then: "#FFEED3",
  equals: "ORANGE_2",
  then: "#FFDCA3",
  equals: "ORANGE_3",
  then: "#FAA92F",
  equals: "ORANGE_4",
  then: "#995C00",
  /* Blue Colors */
  equals: "BLUE_0",
  then: cons!AS_GCM_HEX_CODE_BLUE_0,
  equals: "BLUE_1",
  then: cons!AS_GCM_HEX_CODE_BLUE_1,
  equals: "BLUE_2",
  then: "#AFBFF8",
  equals: "BLUE_3",
  then: "#2322F0",
  equals: "BLUE_4",
  then: cons!AS_GCM_HEX_CODE_BLUE_4,
  equals: "BLUE_5",
  then: "#E9EDFC",
  equals: "BLUE_6",
  then: "#08088D",
  equals: "BLUE_7",
  then: "#DCDEF5",
  /* Green Colors  */
  equals: "GREEN_1",
  then: "#E3FBDF",
  equals: "GREEN_4",
  then: "#117C00",
  /* Teal Colors */
  equals: "TEAL_1",
  then: "#E2FAF9",
  equals: "TEAL_3",
  then: "#56ADC0",
  equals: "TEAL_4",
  then: "#2C6770",
  /* Purple Colors */
  equals: "PURPLE_1",
  then: "#F2E9FF",
  equals: "PURPLE_3",
  then: "#B561FF",
  equals: "PURPLE_4",
  then: "#790DA1",
  /* Red Colors */
  equals: "RED_4",
  then: "#9F0019",
  /* Yellow Colors */
  equals: "YELLOW_0",
  then: "#FFFCEB",
  equals: "YELLOW_1",
  then: "#FFF6C9",
  equals: "YELLOW_4",
  then: "#856C00",
  /* Appian Colors */
  equals: "APPIAN_BACKGROUND",
  then: cons!AS_GCM_HEX_CODE_APPIAN_BACKGROUND,
  equals: "ACCENT",
  then: "#2322f0",
  default: ri!colorName
)

_a-0000ec50-376f-8000-9d94-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_UT_queryRecordByIdentifier
_a-0000ec50-376f-8000-9d94-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
/*

PLEASE REFER TO THE BOTTOM OF THIS RULE FOR INSTRUCTIONS ON HOW TO USE

Please DO NOT auto-format this rule

*/
a!localVariables(
  /*Determine the castResultToType*/
  local!castResultToType: a!defaultValue(ri!castToCdtType, ri!recordType),
  /*Execute the query*/
  local!queryResult: a!refreshVariable(
    value: if(
      ri!executeWhen = false,
      null(ri!recordType),
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryRecordByIdentifier"(
        recordType: ri!recordType,
        identifier: ri!identifier,
        fields: rule!AS_CO_UT_rejectNullValuesFromArray(
          {
            ri!fields,
            index(
              ri!relatedRecordData,
              "relationship",
              null
            )
          }
        ),
        relatedRecordData: ri!relatedRecordData
      )
    ),
    refreshOnVarChange: ri!triggerRefresh,
    refreshInterval: ri!refreshInterval,
    refreshAfter: { "RECORD_ACTION" }
  ),
  rule!AS_CO_UT_cast(
    type: local!castResultToType,
    value: local!queryResult
  )
)/*

DOCUMENTATION

This rule is designed to minimize the overhead with querying data and then casting the result


Required Inputs:

1. recordType
- This is a recordtype! input of the data type to be queried against

2. identifier
- The primary key of the record type which needs to be queried

Optional Inputs:

3. executeWhen
- The query will not execute if this is false, the query will execute if this is true or null
-- This is meant to operate in a similar manner to the showWhen parameter of components
- Use this to skip execution of a query without needing to wrap if() statements around the rule
-- Examples of this would be to skip querying if your filter value is a null ID
- If the query does not execute, this will return a null value whose type is based on the returnType input

4. triggerRefresh
- By default, the query will always re-execute whenever any inputs change
- However, by updating the value of triggerRefresh, you can also trigger a re-execution even if none of the other inputs change (e.g. after a record action)

5. castToCdtType
- Any cdt type to the cast the result set. 

6. fields
- The record fields that need to be queried

7. relatedRecordData
- the relatedRecordData in which the filters and limit can be specified for each relationship

*/

    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(

    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "relationAuditId",
      operator: "=",
      value: ri!relationAuditId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "relationId",

)

_a-0000eb16-753f-8000-9d01-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
rule!AS_CO_UT_queryRecord(
  recordType: recordType!AS GCM Clause Set Clause Synced,
  relatedRecordData: ri!relatedRecordData,
  filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AS GCM Clause Set Clause Synced.relationId,
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!relationIds
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AS GCM Clause Set Clause Synced.setId,
      operator: "=",
      value: ri!setId
    ),
    ri!additionalfilters
  },
  fields: rule!AS_CO_UT_rejectNullValuesFromArray(
    {
      ri!fields,
      if(
        ri!includeRelatedRecords,
        {
          recordType!AS GCM Clause Set Clause Synced.clauseSet,
          recordType!AS GCM Clause Set Clause Synced.clauseInclusionReason,
          recordType!AS GCM Clause Set Clause Synced.format,
          recordType!AS GCM Clause Set Clause Synced.refAddedVia,
          recordType!AS GCM Clause Set Clause Synced.refFormat,
          recordType!AS GCM Clause Set Clause Synced.refReasonForRemoval,
          recordType!AS GCM Clause Set Clause Synced.refStatus,
          recordType!AS GCM Clause Set Clause Synced.refUsage,
          recordType!AS GCM Clause Set Clause Synced.refClause,
          recordType!AS GCM Clause Set Clause Synced.section
        },
        {}
      )
    }
  ),
  sort: ri!sortInfo,
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  returnType: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!returnType,
    default: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_OBJECT_ARRAY
  ),
  executeWhen: and(
    ri!executeWhen,
    or(
      a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!relationIds),
      a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!setId),
      a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!additionalfilters),
      a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!logicalExpression),
      a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!aggregationFields),
      and(
        ri!getAllRecords = true(),
        rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!fields)
      )
    )
  ),
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
  logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
  aggregationFields: ri!aggregationFields
)

  recordType!AS GCM QNM T Questionnaire.questionnaireTemplateId: - 1,
  recordType!AS GCM QNM T Questionnaire.name: "Test questionnaire",
  recordType!AS GCM QNM T Questionnaire.description: "This is a test questionnaire for use in interface default inputs.  Because it is not persisted to the database and exists only in a rule, it may not behave as expected with record actions or other database related operations.",
  recordType!AS GCM QNM T Questionnaire.questionCategories: {
    recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question Category(
      recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question Category.questionCategoryTemplateId: - 1,
      recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question Category.displayOrder: 1,
      recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question Category.questionCategoryName: "Category 1",
      recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question Category.isActive: true()
    ),
    recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question Category(
      recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question Category.questionCategoryTemplateId: - 2,
      recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question Category.displayOrder: 2,
      recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question Category.questionCategoryName: "Category 2",
      recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question Category.isActive: true()
    ),
    recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question Category(
      recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question Category.questionCategoryTemplateId: - 3,
      recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question Category.displayOrder: 3,
      recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question Category.questionCategoryName: "Category 3",
      recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question Category.isActive: true()
